name: 林國水
objective:
先修課程：無
中文:專案管理是指專案團隊將管理知識、技巧、工具和技術綜合運用到專案活動以符合專案需求的專案管理程序；本課程目標在於講授專案管理概念與方法，並藉由專案管理知識體系(PMBOK)來介紹專案管理五大程序組與九大知識領域。本課程並藉由專案計畫書撰寫的應用實務訓練及專案管理軟體的實作，培養學生專案管理專業理論與實務能力。※修過本課程成績合格，可同時取得國際專案管理師考試證照所須之上課時數資格，進一步得選擇參加考試、考取國際證照。
English: Project management is the discipline of applying knowledge, skills, tools and techniques that enable the project team to organize their work to project activities and to meet the project requirements. The objective of this course is to provide students a thorough understanding of the project management discipline and of the best practice of PMBOK. As an internationally recognized best practice, the Project Management Body of Knowledge (PMBOK) is a collection of five basic process groups and nine knowledge areas. In order to enhance their theoretical as well as practical capabilities, students will be trained to develop a project management plan. Besides, students will also be taught to use project management software to estimate the cost and develop the schedule for a project.
